title: Revolut 過唔到港紙 有無其他方法

replies.msg:
平時係外國會過錢去香港戶口
唔收手續費 好方便
但直家唔得 岩岩收到下面個msg
仲有無人有其他方法過錢返香港

［Hi there, due to unforeseen changes implemented recently by our payment processor which affect all local HKD payments, we regret to inform you that you’re currently unable to:

- Send local HKD payments
- Create new HKD payees

We’re really sorry about this, and from today, we allow you to send HKD payments via SWIFT. Because SWIFT payments can take a little longer, please allow extra time for your transfers to arrive. SWIFT payments may also incur fees from intermediary banks, which are beyond our control.］
用 IB 啦，不過一個月只可以過一次
